To get the current exchange rate for USD to BDT, I can suggest some reliable sources from the search results. 

You can use the currency converter at Exchange-Rates.org, Xe, Wise, Forbes, or The Money Converter to find the live exchange rate between USD and BDT. 

Please note that the exchange rate may fluctuate constantly, and it's best to check the current rate from one of these reliable sources for the most up-to-date information.

You can check the current exchange rate on websites such as Wise, Exchange-Rates.org, Valuta.Exchange, or Forbes, which provide real-time currency conversion rates. 

To get the most accurate and up-to-date information, I recommend visiting one of these websites and using their currency converter tool. They will be able to provide you with the current exchange rate. 

Please note that the exchange rate may fluctuate constantly, so it's best to check the current rate from one of these reliable sources for the most up-to-date information.
